segments.text: Wow ! Look at all these books ! I bet I can find a book about anything here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shih ! ! Please keep your voice down . There are people reading and studying here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I'm sorry . Are you the librarian ? Maybe you can help me , I am looking for a book .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes I am . You can check our online catalog to search the book you want based on the genre , title or if you know the author , I can point you towards the right direction .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am looking for a book that has nursery rhymes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That would be in our children's section . That book shelf there on the right .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I would like to check out these books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have a library card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . How do I get one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just need to see your drivers license or utility bill to prove that you a resident of this state .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you are all set . You can have these books for two weeks . If you need to have them longer , you can bring them here to renew them . If you don't , you get charged ten cents a day for each book .
segments.speaker: S2
